section.title: ImportError: No module named 'zlib'
section.para: 问题：编译安装的python3.4.2使用中提示 ImportError: No module named 'zlib'
原因：这个原因是你没有安装zlib
解决方法：安装 zlib-devel 后重新编译安装
section.screen:
yum install zlib-devel
./configure --prefix=/srv/python-3.4.2 make -j8 make install

section.title: UnicodeDecodeError: 'utf-8' codec can't decode byte 0xb2 in position 679: invalid start byte
section.para: 解决方法指定编码encoding='utf-8', errors='ignore'
